name: Pipe it up
description: Pipe it up is a 3D puzzle platformer. Help the little robot to get the big machine going again. Your task is simple, but the way to get there is difficult. Not only do you have to get to the gaps in the energy circuit first, but you also have to find the necessary spare parts. Explore the room and use the energy flow to get through the level. Only then will you bring the mysterious machine back to life.
